argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpdivf.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | grpdivf.3 | |- D = ( /g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( inv ` G ) = ( inv ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_grpodivval | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A D B ) = ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A D B ) G B ) = ( ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) G B ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> G e. GrpOp ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simp2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> A e. X ) |
| 8 | 1, 3 | #P_grpoinvcl | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) e. X ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) e. X ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simp3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> B e. X ) |
| 11 | 1 | #P_grpoass | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ ( A e. X /\ ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) e. X /\ B e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) G B ) = ( A G ( ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) G B ) ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 7, 9, 10, 11 | #P_syl13anc | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) G B ) = ( A G ( ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) G B ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( GId ` G ) = ( GId ` G ) |
| 14 | 1, 13, 3 | #P_grpolinv | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) G B ) = ( GId ` G ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G ( ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) G B ) ) = ( A G ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G ( ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) G B ) ) = ( A G ( GId ` G ) ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 13 | #P_grporid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( A G ( GId ` G ) ) = A ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_3adant3 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G ( GId ` G ) ) = A ) |
| 19 | 16, 18 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A G ( ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) G B ) ) = A ) |
| 20 | 12, 19 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A G ( ( inv ` G ) ` B ) ) G B ) = A ) |
| 21 | 5, 20 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A D B ) G B ) = A ) |
